attributes.action: Change the tree in Trafalgar Square, we want a better Tree to represent London
attributes.additional_details:
Change the tree in Trafalgar Square, we want a better Tree to represent London

Change the tree in Trafalgar Square, we want a better Christmas Tree to represent London, and our great nation. We want it to be redecorated in a more traditional style.

The tree that has been erected in Trafalgar Square does not represent us as a christmas loving nation.
attributes.background:
Change the tree in Trafalgar Square, we want a better Christmas Tree to represent London, and our great nation. We want it to be redecorated in a more traditional style.

The tree that has been erected in Trafalgar Square does not represent us as a christmas loving nation.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for. 
 
You may want to start a petition to the London Assembly, or write to the Mayor of London.

You can find more information about creating a petition to the London Assembly here:

https://www.london.gov.uk/who-we-are/what-london-assembly-does/petitions
